com.satori.bots.framework

Interface Bot


  • public interface Bot
    This interface identifies the class as a Satori Bot

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSetup(BotContext botContext)
      Invoked when the bot is being launched.
      void onSubscriptionData(BotContext ctx, RtmSubscriptionData subscriptionData)
      Invoked every time data is received on any channel that the bot is subscribed to

    • Method Detail

      • onSetup

        void onSetup(BotContext botContext)
        Invoked when the bot is being launched. Can be used to initialize bot data structures, retrieve state from RTM KV, pre-spawn worker pools, spawn executors for periodic tasks, etc. The bot does not receive any data until this function returns
        Parameters:
        botContext - Bot context for this bot BotContext

      • onSubscriptionData

        void onSubscriptionData(BotContext ctx,
                        RtmSubscriptionData subscriptionData)
        Invoked every time data is received on any channel that the bot is subscribed to
        Parameters:
        ctx - Bot context for this bot BotContext
        subscriptionData - Received data RtmSubscriptionData
